* Iron Raptor watches and smiles as she watched Shadow Cat jump to her feet 
after untangling herself from the mass of arms and legs her brother and 
herself had created, glad to see her old friends again. However, the tiny 
fur-ball was relitively new to her.
Chuckling to herself as she sees Shadow Cat give her brother slag.
They were bothing just like she remembered them to be. Shadow Cat so serious 
at times and then have her own sense of humor�Snow Tech just seeming to be a 
walking joke.
But when Shadow Cat turned to her she blushed.*

� Yeah, I guess I have.�

* Looking at a whist of hair that fell over her eyes, simply moving it out 
of the way.
Iron Raptor steps back though when the fembot moves towards her to give her 
a hug, never really seeming like one who liked them.
In the old days she had never liked sentimant, and now that she was with 
Prowl she really didn�t think it was that bad. But she only didn�t mind it 
from him, everyone else�she didn�t think so. Then smiling while she falls 
and yells at her brother.*

< Hopeless.>

* She thinks to herself.
She didn�t see Snow Tech get to his feet and dust himself on, looking in 
surprise as he had grabbed her arm.
Iron Raptor looked at Snow Tech as if she thought he was crazy as he spoke 
to Prowl, then her look turned into a smile and she laughed at what he said.
This really WAS Snow Tech.
She doesn�t move to get her arm out of his grasp, knowing that he was simply 
joking around as usual.
But then Iron Raptor�s laugh dies away to a chuckle and then nothing as she 
feels Prowls anger, simply looking at him in surprise as she feels the anger 
coming from him. It hadn�t numbed her like last time because she hadn�t just 
come out of battle rage, it just come this time.
But then Iron Raptor got a little edgy when Prowl had taken a step towards 
Snow Tech, wondering why he was acting to hostile to a silly joke.
She saw him take out and point his wing missiles towards Snow Tech, her 
expression turning angry as well but not as enraged as Prowls.

< What do you think you�re doing?>

But then Iron Raptor answers Prowls question.

< It�s just a joke, love. He does that all the time.>

Her attention then caught by Snow Tech as he speaks to her.
But then as everything wore on she simply rolled her eyes and shook her 
head.
They were both turning out to be complete idiots�.
Stepping out from between the shield that Snow Tech had just activated she 
gave Prowl  look that said everything, he was acting just like a child along 
with her friend.
Simply stepping off to the side and crossing her arms, looking at both of 
them from under her bangs.

< Why don�t you two just get into a pissing contest and get it over with?>

But she just stood there as Prowl simply walked over to her as if nothing 
happened, sliding an arm around her.
She wasn�t impressed at all, by any of them.

< I�m waiting for my friends first, so we can get back to base together.>

Iron Raptor then looked towards Snow Tech, glad to at least have the weapons 
put away and emotions not so powerful as before.*

� We�re going back to base now, Snow Tech, maybe Shadow Cat can fly you?�
